duties_responsibilities.duty: Act as the primary point of contact for property owners, addressing their inquiries, concerns, and requests promptly and professionally.
Guide new property owners through the onboarding process, explaining our services, setting expectations, and assisting them in optimizing their property listing.
Facilitate the offboarding process for owners, ensuring a smooth transition as they withdraw their property from our management.
Develop and implement strategies to enhance owner loyalty and satisfaction, aiming for long-term partnerships.
Collaborate with our content team across multiple technologies to curate and update property listings with accurate and engaging content, including descriptions, photos, and amenities.
Work closely with property owners to identify areas for improvement. Coordinate enhancement and maintenance plans to enhance property value and guest experiences.
Analyze property performance metrics and trends, providing valuable insights to property owners to optimize revenue generation.
Foster effective communication and collaboration between different internal teams, including marketing, operations, and finance, to achieve seamless owner management.

education_certification.credential: Bachelor's degree or equivalent experience in business, hospitality, or related field.
Knowledge of standard Customer Success/Experience practices
